assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Dexon Technology Public Company Limited, a technology company, provides non-destructive inspection testing, in-line inspection, and asset integrity management services worldwide. It offers integrity services, such as risk based inspection, fitness for service, and inspection databases; pressure vessel and sphere tank, piping, tank, boiler, crane, oil tank truck, flare, lifting gear, wind turbine, and paint and coating inspection services; drone, tube inspection, advance ultrasonic, and other services; hardness testing, magnetic particle, penetrant, positive material identification, and conventional radiographic testing services; and engineering services. The company also provides pipeline pigging, inline inspection, ultrasonic in-line inspection, ultrasonic rotary and multi-channel ring in-line inspection, ultrasonic multi-channel octopus and hawk in-line inspection, caliper in-line inspection, magnetic flux leakage, pipeline cleaning, pig tracking, and unpiggable pipeline in-line inspection services. In addition, it offers inspection training of inspection standards and distributor of tools, spare parts, and equipment. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Ban Chang, Thailand.
